thread.title: Mondelez revenue beats estimates on strong demand in Europe

title: Mondelez revenue beats estimates on strong demand in Europe
text:
May 1, 2018 / 8:19 PM / Updated 9 minutes ago Mondelez revenue beats estimates on strong demand in Europe Reuters Staff 1 Min Read
(Reuters) - Mondelez International Inc ( MDLZ.O ) reported better-than-expected quarterly revenue on Tuesday, as the snack maker benefited from strong demand in Europe and emerging markets. FILE PHOTO: Cadbury chocolate products are is seen inside a shop in Shah Alam outside Kuala Lumpur June 11, 2014. REUTERS/Samsul Said/File Photo
The company said its net revenue rose 5.5 percent to $6.77 billion, beating analystsâ€™ average estimate of $6.65 billion (4.88 billion pounds), according to Thomson Reuters I/B/E/S.
Net income attributable to the company rose to $938 million, or 62 cents per share, in the first quarter ended March 31, from $630 million, or 41 cents per share, a year earlier. Reporting by Vibhuti Sharma in Bengaluru; Editing by Sriraj Kalluvila
